name: Good luck, stay safe
description:
Intense Zombie Shooter, play with M/KB or Controller.  

Current demo version 1.0 - Features 1 level and 3 secrets for you to uncover.

Controls - - - - - - - - - - - -

WASD - Movement

LMB - Shoot

RMB - Aim

Space - Melee

C - Enable controller mode (Cannot be turned off without restart)
